meanings.definition: The position or office of a postmaster.
meanings.sent1: Her postmasterships involved managing the local post office.
meanings.sent2: The postmasterships in small towns are crucial for efficient mail delivery.
meanings.sent3: The postmasterships in the village were so busy, they had to hire extra help.
meanings.sent4: She ruled over the postmasterships with an iron fist, ensuring all mail was delivered on time.
meanings.sent5: The postmasterships were like the captains of the mail ships, guiding letters to their destinations.

meanings.definition: The duties or responsibilities of a postmaster.
meanings.sent1: His postmasterships included sorting mail and assisting customers.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the postmasterships is essential for anyone working at a post office.
meanings.sent3: The postmasterships had a secret handshake to identify each other in public.
meanings.sent4: She juggled her postmasterships with ease, never missing a delivery deadline.
meanings.sent5: The postmasterships required attention to detail and excellent organizational skills.
